Doctor and Master's Degrees Conferred on Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Doctor and Master's Degrees Conferred on Overseas Koreans 
    Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK doctor's degree of history was conferred on Yun Hyon Chol, teacher of the Faculty of History at Yanbian University in China, who studied and systematized Palhae history of land and marine transport on the basis of the principle of fidelity to historical truth to scientifically ascertain that Palhae succeded to Koguryo Dynasty and that the history of Palhae is an important component of the history of the Korean nation, and DPRK master's degree of linguistics on Kim Jun, vice-director of the Instruction Department at Joson University under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), who studied the theory of education and the method of teaching to contribute to education in foreign languages, working in the field of Chongryon education for a long time.
 Awarding ceremonies were held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on January 7.    
 Present were Vice-Premier of the DPRK Cebinet Kwak Pom Gi, Secretary General of the State Commission for Conferring Degrees and Titles Kang Chun Gum, officials concerned and staff members of the Chinese embassy in Pyongyang.

articles.title: S. Korean Unionists Called Upon to Make Radical Advance in Labor Movement
articles.content:
S. Korean Unionists Called Upon to Make Radical Advance in Labor Movement 
    Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Tan Pyong Ho, chairman of the (south) Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, in an article on the New Year reportedly said that a radical advance should be made in the labour movement in the New Year and that to this end organizational unity of workers should be strengthened still further.
 Workers should turn out in the struggle to build a society in which they would become masters of politics completely free from domination of the outside forces and the capital and realize the independent reunification of the nation, he stressed.

Congratulations to Philippine Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Philippine Foreign Minister
    Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a congratulatory message to Delia Domingo Albert on his appointment as foreign minister of Philippines.
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would more favorably develop in various fields, the message wished him success in his new office.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Iran Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Iran Appointed
    Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Chang Ryong was appointed as DPRK ambassador e.p. to Iran according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
